text: DRUMSTICK Minis Vanilla with Chocolatey Swirl
DRUMSTICK Minis Vanilla with Chocolatey Swirl mixes the creamy taste of vanilla with crunchy peanuts and delicious chocolatey swirl.
The original sundae coneÂ® for over 80 years
At 120 calories per 66 ml cone, enjoy this mini size of your favourite Drumstick treat
Made in London, Ontario using ingredients from Canadian dairy
